mentors.title: Featured Mentors
mentors.subtitle: Browse our curated list of experienced professionals
mentors.browseDescription: Browse our curated list of experienced professionals
mentors.noMentorsFound: No mentors found matching your criteria
mentors.noResultsFilter: No mentors found matching your filters. Try adjusting your search criteria.
mentors.noResults: No mentors available at the moment.

mentorOnboarding.title: Become a Mentor
mentorOnboarding.description: Join MentorConnect and share your expertise with Amazon employees and the wider community
mentorOnboarding.subtitle: Share your expertise and help others grow in their careers
mentorOnboarding.contextDescription: Join our community of expert mentors and make a meaningful impact on professionals seeking guidance. Your experience and insights can help shape the next generation of leaders.
mentorOnboarding.benefit1Desc: Guide mentees through career challenges and celebrate their growth
mentorOnboarding.benefit2Desc: Choose your availability and session durations that work for you
mentorOnboarding.benefit3Desc: Connect with mentees from across the MENA region and beyond
mentorOnboarding.photoUploadSuccess: Your photo has been uploaded successfully
mentorOnboarding.bioPlaceholder: Tell mentees about your experience and what you can help with...
mentorOnboarding.calSetupLink: Please set up your Cal Calendar
mentorOnboarding.assistantEmailHelp: Enter your assistant's email for booking communications
mentorOnboarding.mentorshipPreferenceHelp: How would you prefer to work with mentees?
mentorOnboarding.ongoingMentorshipDesc: Long-term commitment with a single mentee for deeper relationship
mentorOnboarding.rotatingMenteesDesc: Flexible scheduling with various mentees for diverse perspectives
mentorOnboarding.successMessage: Your mentor profile has been created successfully.

menteeRegistration.title: Join as a Mentee
menteeRegistration.description: Connect with expert mentors from Amazon and beyond
menteeRegistration.subtitle: Connect with experienced mentors and accelerate your growth
menteeRegistration.contextDescription: Join MentorConnect to access personalized guidance from industry experts. Whether you're an individual seeking career growth or an organization looking to develop your team, we're here to help.
menteeRegistration.benefit1Desc: Connect with professionals from Amazon UAE and leading companies
menteeRegistration.benefit2Desc: Get guidance tailored to your specific career objectives
menteeRegistration.benefit3Desc: Access resources and sessions to accelerate your development
menteeRegistration.bioPlaceholder: Tell mentors about yourself and your goals...
menteeRegistration.areasExploringHelp: Select the skills and areas you want to learn more about
menteeRegistration.missionPlaceholder: Describe your organization's mission and values...
menteeRegistration.needsPlaceholder: What challenges are you facing? What do you hope to achieve through mentorship?
menteeRegistration.successMessage: Your profile has been created successfully.

analytics.subtitle: Comprehensive insights into your mentorship program's performance

identity.enterDetailsDescription: To enable automatic session tracking, please provide your name and email. This will be saved and used for all future bookings.
identity.enterDetailsPrompt: Enter your details to enable automatic booking tracking
identity.pleaseEnterDetails: Please enter your details to start booking sessions
identity.identitySavedDescription: You're all set! Your future sessions will be tracked automatically.

session.bookingRecordedDescription: Your mentorship session has been tracked successfully.
session.recordingFailedDescription: We couldn't save your booking after multiple attempts. Please contact support.
